ygData.subject: Re: Boozin' Bards
ygData.msgSnippet: You can find a Brewing Limericks book with recipes in Kaladim.  Once insided, take the first left.  The first building you find on the left side is a pub.  Not
ygData.messageBody:
You can find a Brewing Limericks book with recipes in Kaladim. Once
insided, take the first left. The first building you find on the left side
is a pub. Not certain of the name but you can buy one there.

Galtin
E'ci

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Roop Dirump [SMTP:roop@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, May 04, 1999 11:10 AM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqbards] Re: Boozin' Bards
>
> From: "Roop Dirump" <roop@...>
>
> >first. I found a list of alcohol recipes at eqvault (in poem form
> appropriately). I
> >could not find the Brewing Manual. I looked for it all over Faydwer, in
> Freeport, and
> >Rivervale. I found out I needed a shot glass in order to drink hard
> liquor.
> >
> >Narcissus of Povar
>
>
> Now I'd have to check again to be absolutely sure, but I'm certain a gnome
> was selling the brewing manual, believe at the windmills in steamfont.
> I'm
> currently travelling the mainland and may not be back for a few days, but
> maybe someone can confirm before then.
>
> Strange that manual is so hard to find, and on an island that doesn't even
> seem to sell brewing supplies.
>
> Roop
>
>
